CRITICAL-SLASHING-1-TEXT: Normal damage and target suffers from humiliation and may only attack you (%SAVE-CRITICAL=Wis saving throw negates%).
CRITICAL-SLASHING-2-TEXT: Normal damage and target loses 1d3 fingers and takes 1 %ABILITY-CON=Con% and %ABILITY-STR=Str% %ABILITY-REDUCTION=ability reduction% that only be healed with Greater Restoration (%SAVE-CRITICAL=Dex saving throw negates%).
CRITICAL-SLASHING-3-TEXT: Double damage and all attack rolls of 19 or 20 against the target are critical hits for the next 3 rounds.
CRITICAL-SLASHING-4-TEXT: Double damage and push target 5 feet in any direction.
CRITICAL-SLASHING-6-TEXT: Double damage and death (%SAVE-CRITICAL=Dex saving throw negates%).
CRITICAL-SLASHING-7-TEXT: Double damage and target takes a -2 penalty to AC for 1d4 rounds.
CRITICAL-SLASHING-8-TEXT: Normal damage and the target is %STATUS-EXHAUSTED=exhausted by 2 stages%.
CRITICAL-SLASHING-9-TEXT: Normal damage and 1 %ABILITY-CON=Con% %ABILITY-REDUCTION=ability reduction%. Target cannot speak or bite %UNTIL-HEALED=until healed%.
CRITICAL-SLASHING-10-TEXT: Normal damage and 1d2 %ABILITY-DEX=Dex% %ABILITY-REDUCTION=ability reduction% and target is knocked %STATUS-PRONE=prone%.
CRITICAL-SLASHING-11-TEXT: Normal damage and 1 %ABILITY-CON=Con% and %ABILITY-CHA=Cha% %ABILITY-REDUCTION=ability reduction%. The target has disadvantage on Perception checks and ranged attacks %UNTIL-HEALED=until healed%.
CRITICAL-SLASHING-12-TEXT: Double damage and the target is %STATUS-EXHAUSTED=exhausted by 1 stage%. Target cannot swallow whole.
CRITICAL-SLASHING-13-TEXT: Double damage and target loses flight if it uses wings.
CRITICAL-SLASHING-14-TEXT: Normal damage and 1 %ABILITY-CHA=Cha% %ABILITY-REDUCTION=ability reduction% that only be healed with Greater Restoration. The target has disadvantage on Perception checks based on sound %UNTIL-HEALED=until healed%.
CRITICAL-SLASHING-15-TEXT: Normal damage and target provokes opportunity attacks from all threatening opponents.
CRITICAL-SLASHING-16-TEXT: Normal damage and the target is %STATUS-EXHAUSTED=exhausted by 2 stages%.
CRITICAL-SLASHING-17-TEXT: Normal damage and the target loses 1d6 hit points as %STATUS-LIFE-DRAIN=life drain%, like a Specter attack. Target cannot talk or breathe normally %UNTIL-HEALED=until healed%.
CRITICAL-SLASHING-18-TEXT: Double damage and +4 to your AC for 1 round.
CRITICAL-SLASHING-19-TEXT: Triple damage, but you drop your weapon.
CRITICAL-SLASHING-21-TEXT: Normal damage and -4 penalty on attack rolls and ability checks for 1d4 rounds.
CRITICAL-SLASHING-22-TEXT: Normal damage and target loses hand and takes 1d3 %ABILITY-CON=Con% and %ABILITY-STR=Str% %ABILITY-REDUCTION=ability reduction% that only be healed with Greater Restoration (%SAVE-CRITICAL=Dex saving throw negates%).
CRITICAL-SLASHING-24-TEXT: Double damage and one free attack against the target with disadvantage.
CRITICAL-SLASHING-25-TEXT: Normal damage and the target is %STATUS-EXHAUSTED=exhausted by 1 stage%.
CRITICAL-SLASHING-26-TEXT: Double damage and 1d4 %ABILITY-CON=Con% %ABILITY-REDUCTION=ability reduction% and the target is %STATUS-EXHAUSTED=exhausted by 1 stage%.
CRITICAL-SLASHING-27-TEXT: Double damage and target is %STATUS-EXHAUSTED=exhausted by 1 stage%.
CRITICAL-SLASHING-28-TEXT: Double damage and 1 %ABILITY-CON=Con% %ABILITY-REDUCTION=ability reduction% and the target is %STATUS-EXHAUSTED=exhausted by 1 stage%.
CRITICAL-SLASHING-30-TEXT: Normal damage and 1 %ABILITY-DEX=Dex% %ABILITY-REDUCTION=ability reduction%. Target cannot use one hand %UNTIL-HEALED=until healed%.
CRITICAL-SLASHING-31-TEXT: Double damage and target has 1 item disarmed.
CRITICAL-SLASHING-32-TEXT: Double damage and target is %STATUS-INCAPACITATED=incapacitated% for 1 round.
CRITICAL-SLASHING-33-TEXT: Double damage and %OBJECT-DAMAGE=normal damage% to target's weapon.
CRITICAL-SLASHING-34-TEXT: Double damage and you may automatically grapple the target.
CRITICAL-SLASHING-35-TEXT: Double damage and +2 on all your attack rolls for 1d3 round.
CRITICAL-SLASHING-36-TEXT: Double damage and the target is %STATUS-EXHAUSTED=exhausted by 1 stage%. The next time he casts a verbal spell rolls 1d20: 1-10: the spell is lost. 11-20 the spell is cast.
CRITICAL-SLASHING-37-TEXT: Normal damage and target is %STATUS-POISONED=poisoned% for 1d6 rounds.
CRITICAL-SLASHING-38-TEXT: Normal damage and target permanently %STATUS-BLINDED=blinded% (%SAVE-CRITICAL=Dex saving throw negates%).
CRITICAL-SLASHING-39-TEXT: Normal damage and 1d3 %ABILITY-CHA=Cha% %ABILITY-REDUCTION=ability reduction% and 1 %ABILITY-CHA=Cha% %ABILITY-REDUCTION=ability reduction% that only be healed with Greater Restoration (%SAVE-CRITICAL=Con saving throw negates% Cha reduction).
CRITICAL-SLASHING-40-TEXT: Double damage and target is pushed 1d6 × 5 feets directly away.
CRITICAL-SLASHING-42-TEXT: Double damage and if the target is wearing armor its speed is reduced by 10 feet until fixed (Requires Craft for 15% of the item value).
CRITICAL-SLASHING-43-TEXT: Double damage and 3d6 %ABILITY-DEX=Dex% %ABILITY-REDUCTION=ability reduction% (%SAVE-CRITICAL=Con saving throw halves%).
CRITICAL-SLASHING-44-TEXT: Double damage and the target is %STATUS-EXHAUSTED=exhausted by 1 stage%.
CRITICAL-SLASHING-45-TEXT: Normal damage and the target is %STATUS-EXHAUSTED=exhausted by 1 stage%.
CRITICAL-SLASHING-46-TEXT: Normal damage and the target is %STATUS-EXHAUSTED=exhausted by 1 stage%. Target is %STATUS-BLINDED=blinded% until healed.
CRITICAL-SLASHING-47-TEXT: Double damage and target is knocked %STATUS-PRONE=prone%.
CRITICAL-SLASHING-48-TEXT: Double damage and 1 %ABILITY-CHA=Cha% %ABILITY-REDUCTION=ability reduction% that only be healed with Greater Restoration.
CRITICAL-SLASHING-49-TEXT: Double damage and %OBJECT-DAMAGE=normal damage% to target's shield.
CRITICAL-SLASHING-50-TEXT: Double damage and %OBJECT-DAMAGE=normal damage% to target's armor.
CRITICAL-SLASHING-51-TEXT: Double damage and one free attack against an adjacent foe at the same bonus.
CRITICAL-SLASHING-52-TEXT: Normal damage and target is %STATUS-RESTRAINED=restrained% for 1 round.
